title: 2 Bd/3Ba Gut-Renovated Duplex w/ Private Backyard
posting_body: ['2 Bedrooms + Guest Room or office on lower level', '3 Full Bathrooms (2 showers, 1 bathtub)', 'Washer/Dryer in-unit', 'Individually controlled Air-conditioning throughout', "Private landscaped backyard fully enclosed for Duplex tenant's use only", 'You can have it all: charming historic details with modern appliances and all-new-everything (this unit was just gut renovated).', 'A private, spacious home with enormous outdoor space, right here in upper Manhattan.', 'This stunning ground-floor, floor-through apartment is a duplex with an incredible private yard.', 'The gated private entrance opens into an open-plan living/dining room with historic woodwork and ornamental fireplace.', 'The first floor has a large master bedroom with great closets and an en-suite bath.', 'A second bedroom faces the garden and has a juliet balcony.', 'There is a second full bath on the first level.', 'Walk down the internal stairs to find ample space for an additional guest room or an office, movie room, or playroom.', 'The lower level also has another full bathroom with an enormous shower.', 'The laundry room features a Bosch washer/dryer with a laundry wash sink and plenty of space for storage shelving.', 'There is considerable closet space throughout the home, and all appliances are Miele or Bosch, with Grohe bathroom fixtures and Flos lighting.', 'Best of all, the lower level opens onto your private, enclosed garden -- a perfect oasis in the city and a comfortable place for kids to play since the only entrance is from inside the house.', 'This is an incredible house-within-a-brownstone, perfect for a family or friends looking to share a home.', 'Other features:', 'Private entrance', 'Bosch Washer/Dryer in unit', 'Bosch kitchen appliances, including induction cooktop, integrated refrigerator, and combination oven/microwave', 'Stone bathrooms with Grohe faucets and Duravit porcelain fixtures', 'New hardwood oak floors throughout', 'Hallway and entry way digital cameras and Schlage LE Digital + Mortise locks provide extra security']
